loclizedContent.En: Believe it or not, Simon was actually hiding there smoking...
loclizedContent.Cn: 不管你相不相信，其实是赛蒙躲在那里抽烟……

loclizedContent.En: Ahhh, I'm really a little scared. Maybe there's nothing wrong with being a fool who knows nothing.
loclizedContent.Cn: 啊啊啊我真的有点害怕了，也许当个什么都不知道的笨蛋没什么不好。

loclizedContent.En: They performed a Pen Fairy ceremony there, so the Pen Fairy was going to stay there for a while.
loclizedContent.Cn: 和你猜得一样，李他们上周在那举行了所谓的笔仙仪式，但是还没问问题就先吓跑了！所以笔仙大概要在那里徘徊好一阵了。

loclizedContent.En: A group of students secretly gathered there to have a barbecue and hotpot.
loclizedContent.Cn: 说起来有些离谱，但这是事实。高二有群学生在那里偷偷聚会烧烤以及吃火锅。
